flawed_nl_solution:
He had 212 sheets and received 307 more for a total of 212+307 = <<212+307=519>>519 sheets
He gave out 156 so he has 519-156 = <<519-156=336>>336 sheets
#### 336

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 363, not 336. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
